name: bot4mirror
description: This is a Telegram bot for mirroring files on the internet to Google Drive.

ENV.description: Setting to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in ENV mode. Don't Change !

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Your ID Folder on Google Drive

OWNER_ID.description: Should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

OWNER_IDS.description: Should be an integer. Second ID of owner of bot

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: Directory where the bot downloaded files and then delete after file upload to Google Drive

DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UPDATE_INTERVAL.description: A short interval of time in seconds after which the mirror progress message is updated. (I recommend to keep it 5 seconds at least)

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Interval of time (in seconds), after which the bot deletes it's message (and command message) which is expected to be viewed instantly. Note: Set to -1 to never automatically delete messages.

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: (Optional Field) Set to True if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: (Optional Field) For automatic authorized chat with ID group

INDEX_URL.description: (Optional Field) Refer to https://github.com/maple3142/GDIndex if you don't have you can skip this step.

UPTOBOX_TOKEN.description: Uptobox token to mirror uptobox links. Get it from [Uptobox Premium Account](https://uptobox.com/my_account).

TELEGRAM_API.description: This is to Authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram Files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

TELEGRAM_HASH.description: This is to Authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram Files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org

MEGA_API_KEY.description: Your key Mega.Nz Account. Get here : https://mega.nz/sdk

BLOCK_MEGA_FOLDER.description: Set true/false if you don't like user mirror from mega.nz (type folder)

BLOCK_MEGA_LINKS.description: Set true/false if you don't like user mirror from mega.nz (type file)

STOP_DUPLICATE_MIRROR.description: Set true/false if you don't like user duplicate mirror

SHORTENER.description: Your shortener, if you want convert all link with shorterner
